East_Orange.East Newark School District:
The East Newark School District is a community public school district that serves students in pre-Kindergarten through eighth grade from East Newark, in Hudson County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its one school had an enrollment of 409 students and 20.8 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 19.7:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "A", the lowest of eight groupings.
